name: Lotus Romance
description:
“Lotus Romance” is a puzzle decryption game with Chinese origami style.

「Features」
Core gameplay is to match the same colors and eliminate.
A lotus romance hidden in the successive levels waits to unveil...

「Core gameplay」
In the pond, if the outermost petals of two adjacent lotuses are the same color, they will be eliminated.
You will get some lotuses. Drag and place them to clear all the lotuses in pond.

「Game Story」
You will find the trail of papar boats randomly.
These paper boats floating on the pond are left by the heroin with the 'letters' on them.
You should follow the trail of the papar boats and collect all the lost 'letters'.
Step by step, unclock the plot to find her love.

What happened to her?
Can you find her and stand the emotional test?
With the development of plot, you will know the romance of her love.

「Highlights」
Simple gameplay, but creative strategy.
All roads lead to Rome. Various methods to pass the level.
It seems simple but requires you think twice in the limited selection.
Three chapters, 60 levels, a test for logical thinking and spatial imagination.

「Art and music」
Chinese origami style with various colors(5 colors to make colorful combinations).
Tranquil and distant music, sound effect changes with the weather.
publishers: Hainan Miwan Interaction Information Technology Co
